Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Heartbreak \Heart"break`\ (-br[=a]k`), n. Crushing sorrow or grief; a yielding to such grief. --Shak. [1913 Webster]
heartbreak n : intense sorrow caused by loss of a loved one (especially by death) [syn: {grief}, {heartache}, {brokenheartedness}]
